places_with_reviews.name: Trimandir, Amreli
places_with_reviews.address: Liliya Rd, Bhojal Para, Amreli, Gujarat 365601, India

reviews.text: So beautiful place and I also try lunch and dinner in unodari food it's so delicious 😋
Very calm and sacred place. You can also have food (lunch and dinner) at very nominal charge (60-70 Rupees) inside temple canteen. Children will also enjoy a lot.

Soothing experience. It's a really calm and composed place of worship.. Here there're idols of jain tirthankar, lord Krishna, shrinathji, Devis and shivling of lord Shiva. For having food here you can avail passes of 70 Rs. And have pure and satvik food here.

This temple is known as Trimandir,
Trimandir is the innovative concept of a non-sectarian temple by Dada Bhagwan. It aims to bring the gods of Jainism, Shaivism, and Vaishnavism on one stage.
Very peaceful, clean and calm place, a canteen and garden area is also here and both are well maintained, you can bring young kids here.
Food is also available here at a cost of Rs. 50/- only and the food is of good quality.

Experience the serenity, tranquility, divinity and peace of this nishpakshpati Trimandir yourself.
There is satvik food and refreshments, stop and stay, parking, garden available.
Easily reachable through Google maps.

If virpur attracts millions, this fatehpur based bhojal dham deserves more. The bhojalram, guru of jalaram bapa was based here and jalaram bapa went to virpur by following his guru's instructions. wonderful calm and Spiritual place with accommodation available.

places_with_reviews.name: Shree Swaminarayan Mukhya Mandir
places_with_reviews.address: Shree Swaminarayan Mukhya Mandir Panidarwaja, J625+399, Gajerapara, Amreli, Gujarat 365601, India

reviews.text:
Swaminarayan Temple Amreli is a magnificent structure that exudes beauty and spirituality in every aspect. This temple, located in the heart of Amreli city in Gujarat, India, is one of the most revered and visited Hindu temples in the region.

The temple's stunning architecture is a blend of traditional and modern styles that reflects the rich cultural heritage of India. The intricate carvings, detailed designs, and exquisite craftsmanship of the temple's interiors and exteriors are a testament to the skill and dedication of the artisans who built it.

The temple's peaceful and serene atmosphere creates a sense of calm and tranquility that is conducive to meditation and introspection. Visitors can enjoy the temple's various facilities, including a spacious prayer hall, wider ground and well built modern rest houses.

The temple's management is highly efficient and dedicated, ensuring that the temple's cleanliness, safety, and security are always maintained. Visitors are treated by saints with warmth and hospitality, making them feel welcome and at home.

The temple's spiritual significance and cultural value make it a must-visit destination for anyone interested in Hinduism and Indian culture. The temple's regular religious and cultural events provide an opportunity for visitors to experience and appreciate the rich traditions and practices of Hinduism.

Overall, Swaminarayan Temple Amreli is a magnificent temple that is worth visiting. It is a testament to India's rich cultural heritage and the enduring spirit of its people. The temple's beauty, spirituality, and hospitality make it a must-visit destination for anyone traveling to Amreli.
Place is very peaceful quite and maintained.

It is very peaceful and nice swaminarayan Mukhya Mandir. Saints are friendly. You can take prasad also there but need to inform in advance. There is facility for paid accommodation which is very at reasonable amount.
It's a good temple
Spiritual place for worship of god. Jay swaminarayan

Amerli Tower is a central place in amreli. Here you can do shopping for multiple things from groceries to jewellery... Main market of Amreli

Here is some information about Amreli Tower:

It is located at J626+3WH, Gajerapara, Amreli, Gujarat 365601, India.

It has a 4.4 star rating on Google Maps.

Here are some reviews of Amreli Tower from Google Search:

"Kathiawadi food is excellent. The way to watching tower is full of adventure at night. You can listen lion roar at night. Take ride in car at 11:30 pm." - GIR N JOY RESORT.

"Amreli Steels has an overall rating of 4.1 out of 5, based on over 41 reviews left anonymously by employees. 87% of employees would recommend working at Amreli Steels to a friend and 81% have a positive outlook for the business." - Glassdoor.

"Hotel city palace stay was nice, all staff very good, daily cleaning rooms. Overall a very good stay there. Thank you." - MakeMyTrip.
